title: Diego Configuration
description: Configuration for defining program configuration to be parsed with diego.

environmentPrefix.description: Prefix for env vars; e.g. the flag --color corresponds to the env variable LUKAS_COLOR.

name.description: Name of the flag. This will be --color at the command line and {PREFIX}_COLOR in the environment.

type.description: Type: either bool, int, or string.

description.description: Description of what this flag configures.
